column4: Estimated proportion of modern slavery (per 1,000 population)
column5: Estimated number of people in modern slavery
column12: Survivors of slavery are identified and supported to exit and remain out of modern slavery (%)
column13: Criminal justice mechanisms function effectively to prevent modern slavery (%)
